comment.body:
"CONCLUSIONS Greater consumption of potatoes, especially french fries, was associated with a higher T2D risk, independent of BMI and other risk factors. Replacement of potatoes with whole grains was associated with a lower T2D risk."
http://care.diabetesjournals.org/content/early/2015/12/09/dc15-0547
people are punished for the peaceful believing like Christianity is

Firefox (which is the parent browser of the TorBrowser) can use [extensions](/1LfvE91ZF18jdG3wW62Dw7NtfTZh737KPL/?Topic:1517335328_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS/Most+important+Firefox+addons) that converts all possible HTTP:// elements and whole websites to HTTPS:// causing encrypted data transfer which Exit nodes can not read. But i think what matter the most is to watch out for HTTP-only web sites when one need to submit sensitive data (login forms, contact forms..). I think Tor browser already helps highlight HTTP only pages. I am still using Tor browser only for very specific sites where main aim is to be anonymous.
